message: Let's split it down the middle. Accept and we can end the game.

I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up too much.
You're not giving me enough, I want a bigger share!
I'm not going to give up too much more. Meet me in the middle, or we can keep negotiating.

I'll take it all, no more negotiations!
